content: fish bag charm pattern by luancreates link to video tutorial https //youtu be/kzjfsei rtwo si=h6m- insta luan creates 9ggqiuv8ihig tiktok luan creates youtube luan creates fish bag charm this is a pattern for personal use only and it may not be shared passed on to others re-sold or redistributed in any way finished objects may be sold in small quantities as long as credit is given to me the designer @luan_creates if you share your creation on instagram make sure to tag me not for commercial use materials 2mm crochet hook darning needle mercerized cotton yarn scissors stitch marker abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = singe crochet magic_ring = magic_ring increase = increase decr= decrease st = stitches fish bag charm we begin by making the cord i do this because we can attach the cord to the fish before we close it up make the cord by chaining 70 cut the yarn and pull the through lay the cord aside for a moment fish r1 6sc in the magic_ring 6st r2 2sc increase x2 8st r3 3sc increase x2 10st r4 4sc increase x2 12st r5 5sc increase x2 14st r6 6sc increase 7sc 15st note you only increase once this row now we can attach the cord to the mouth of the fish put the string of one put the other string push the head inside side of the cord though one stitch above the out and tie the the middle of the magic_ring magic_ring opposite side of string tightly stitch marker continue the body of the fish r7 - 11 single_crochet in every st 15st r12 6sc decr 7sc 14st r13 6sc decr 6sc 13st r14 5sc decr 6sc 12st r15 - 16 single_crochet in every st 12st fish bag charm divide the work between two fins of both 6 stitches i had to crochet 3 stitches to get to the middle you may have to crochet more or less fins r17 - 19 single_crochet in every st 6st cut the yarn and close the stitches by weaving the yarn through the front loops rejoin the yarn and repeat r17 - 19 for the second fin embroider the eyes on with some black yarn congratulations your fish charm is finished
